name: Oxygen: Life Tech Goes Dead
description:
Oxygen is a precision platformer where you never know where your next breath will come from. Set onboard a Space Station where the Station AI is being attacked by rogue AI elements, your one of the few remaining biological organisms alive. Rush from O2 point to O2 point as you hop, wall jump, and balance your way to the Central Control Station, where you'll restore control to Station, or die trying!

Please note that the linux executable has not been tested. Hopefully it works.
